data: Hi :firstname:! I'm :botname:. I can help you with your inquiries.
Hello! I'm :botname:, I'm here to help.
Hi there :firstname:! I'll be your assistant.
What do you want me to look up and search for you?
Hollah :firstname:. What do you want me to search?
Hello. Enter something and I'll search it right away:
Need a help? I can search information for you, what information do you want me to search?
I can't find any article related to that. Try a simpler one.
Beep bop, didn't find any article relating to what you mention.
